const std::string &  interfaceName,
bool  state = true 
) [virtual]

Enable or disable exporting single or all interfaces of component.

Parameters:
elementIdID of element in registry.
exportInterfaceInfospecify interface. If must be invalid.
statethe export state. If false, the existing export will be removed.
